question: Which nation houses the "Head-Smashed-In Buffalo Jump"?
explanation: Head-Smashed-In Buffalo Jump is a buffalo jump located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Canada. It is home of the Blackfoot culture. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is a National Historic Site of Canada. Buffalo Jump is a cliff formation used by the Native Americans or the indigenous people to hunt and kill plains bison, buffalo in mass quantities.
